channel.title: Madeleine!
channel.description:
whos responsible for madeleine's obduction?
i think it is the parents because they left her own her own in the hotel :o what u think?

item.title: Madeleine!
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

It was a mistake on the parents behalf, we all make mistakes, just this one went terribly wrong

item.title: Madeleine!
item.dc:creator: @Kore Kore
item.description:
@Kore wrote:

Hello im Portuguese so ou guys know. Here in Portugual There aren´t many abductions 1st of all:

-> What kind of parents leave 3 kids in a room unlocked?
-> It wasn´t a normal abduction because there where 3 kids why should them/him oly take madelein?

Read full topic

item.title: Madeleine!
item.dc:creator: @Gotta_Catch_Them_All Gotta Catch Them All
item.description:
@Gotta_Catch_Them_All wrote:

[quote=“davidude36, post:4, topic:97915”][quote author=Gotta Catch Them All link=topic=140763.msg1355551#msg1355551 date=1179796166]

whos responsible for madeleine’s obduction?

i think it is the parents because they left her own her own in the hotel :o what u think?

So the person who actually took Madeleine is not responsible at all but it is all the parents fault? Yes, of course…
[/quote]
rofl makes total sense now
Yeah in a way i think about it, it is the parents fault as from what i heard they should have left her alone…

And yes ofcourse the person who took her is responsible i didnt think he wanted the answer that blaitently :)[/quote]

I don’t think it is anyones place to tell them they are responsible for the loss of their little daughter. They probably have sat up every night thinking that to themselves and I don’t think they need people talking about how they are bad parents and all this shit. They have lost their daughter and that is the consequence of them leaving her alone.

Read full topic
